text:
Gin Lane : New York City : Onsite : Senior Javascript Engineer : Full-time

http://ginlane.com/contact

Gin Lane is a collective of creative technologists working on creating consumer experiences of the future.

We're looking for a frontend-inclined Senior Javascript Engineer to work with us on building out engaging interfaces and future tech. If you're working with any combination of React, Radium, JS/CSS Animations, Falcor, ClojureScript or Elm let's talk!

Prefer onsite, but willing to entertain remote around the EST timezone for the right candidate.

----- tech-jobs@ginlane.com -----
